$comment: Model Context Protocol (MCP) Configuration - Default Branch
$comment3: Add more servers in your personal branches: ~/branch-work/.config/mcp/servers.json

args: PATH="$HOME/.eden/bin:$HOME/.volta/bin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin" OP_BIOMETRIC_UNLOCK_ENABLED=true GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN=$(op read 'op://Developer/eden-github-mcp-token/credential' 2>/dev/null || echo '') pnpm dlx @modelcontextprotocol/server-github
CONTEXT7_API_KEY=$(op read 'op://Developer/context7-mcp-api-key/credential' 2>/dev/null || echo '') npx -y mcp-remote https://mcp.context7.com/mcp --header "CONTEXT7_API_KEY: $CONTEXT7_API_KEY"
